branchCategory.name: LEFS Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive (AC Servo Motor, 100/200/400W)
branchCategory.description: The original LEFS slider features an inline motor with a cover. Because the motor drives the ballscrew directly, additional cost of a belt and pulley system is avoided. The motor cover is taller than the load platform, so be aware of potential interference at the origin position.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32, 40 <LI>Maximum work load: 60 kg <LI>Maximum speed: 1500 mm/s (H lead) <LI>Stroke range: 50 to 1000mm in 50mm increments <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: LEFS Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive (AC Servo Motor, 100/200/400W)

relatedProductsItem.name: LECA6 Servo Motor Controller for LEF Series
